/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings and trees on both sides. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. The trees, lush and green, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Streetlights stand sentinel along the sidewalks, ready to bathe the street in light as dusk falls. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, with the sun casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
